p: ZIKV Paraiba/2015 isolate was provided by Stephen Dewhurst (Department of Microbiology and Immunology, University of Rochester, Rochester, NY, USA). ZIKV Uganda/1947 (MR-766 strain) was obtained from the Biodefense and Emerging Infections Research Resources Repository (BEI Resources, NR-50065, Manassas, VA, USA). ZIKV Puerto Rico/2015 (PRVABC59 strain) was kindly provided by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, Atlanta, GA, USA). Virus stocks were propagated in Vero cells and titrated by plaque assay as previously described [ 18, 19].
